advisories.title: Amazon Linux 2 - Libreoffice 2.0 - ALAS2LIBREOFFICE-2023-001: medium priority package update for libreoffice
advisories.description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Libreoffice that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-1183:
	A flaw was found in the Libreoffice package. An attacker can craft an odb containing a "database/script" file with a SCRIPT command where the contents of the file could be written to a new file whose location was determined by the attacker.
